Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.diagnostics

Class ConfigErrorParser

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.diagnostics.ConfigErrorParser
public final class ConfigErrorParser extends Object
Utility for parsing HST configuration error messages. Extracts structured information from ConfigurationRuntimeException messages to support diagnostics.
Since:
5.2.1

  • Method Details

    • extractFailedPath

      public static Optional<String> extractFailedPath(String message)
      Extracts the failed JCR path from an error message. Pattern: "in path '/hst:...' "
      Parameters:
      message - the error message
      Returns:
      the path if found

    • extractYamlFile

      public static Optional<String> extractYamlFile(String message)
      Extracts the YAML configuration file from an error message. Pattern: "[config: hst/configurations/...yaml]" or "defined in [config: ...]"
      Parameters:
      message - the error message
      Returns:
      the YAML file path if found

    • extractNodeType

      public static Optional<String> extractNodeType(String message)
      Extracts the node type from an error message. Pattern: "primary type 'hst:component'" or "type 'hst:component'"
      Parameters:
      message - the error message
      Returns:
      the node type if found

    • extractPropertyIssue

      public static Optional<String> extractPropertyIssue(String message)
      Extracts property definition issue from error message. Pattern: "no matching property definition found for {uri}property"
      Parameters:
      message - the error message
      Returns:
      the property identifier if found

    • findConfigurationException

      public static Optional<org.onehippo.cm.engine.ConfigurationRuntimeException> findConfigurationException(Throwable error)
      Finds a ConfigurationRuntimeException in the exception chain. Walks the cause chain looking for ConfigurationRuntimeException.
      Parameters:
      error - the exception to search
      Returns:
      the ConfigurationRuntimeException if found

    • findParserException

      public static Optional<org.onehippo.cm.model.parser.ParserException> findParserException(Throwable error)
      Finds a ParserException in the exception chain. Walks the cause chain looking for ParserException (YAML authoring errors).
      Parameters:
      error - the exception to search
      Returns:
      the ParserException if found

    • findBySimpleName

      public static Optional<Throwable> findBySimpleName(Throwable error, String simpleName)
      Finds an exception in the cause chain matching the given simple class name. Used for impl-package exceptions (e.g. CircularDependencyException, DuplicateNameException) that have no stability contract on their fully-qualified name.
      Parameters:
      error - the exception to search
      simpleName - the simple class name to match
      Returns:
      the matching throwable if found
